Descritivo_da_US: US01: Como Scrum Master quero editar as respostas do questionário para melhor representar um fator
Tarefa_mapeada: Fazer validação de dados no cliente.
Tarefa_original: #1- Editar opções de resposta/evidência de cada pergunta - [DONE - Breno]
NFR_Sentença: The system must identify data that did not pass edit checks, and present such data to the customer/user for correction. Edit checking will continue until all data submitted is correct.

Descritivo_da_US: US01: Como Scrum Master quero editar as respostas do questionário para melhor representar um fator
Tarefa_original: #2- Salvar as novas respostas no servidor[DONE - Breno]
NFR_Sentença: The system must validate all data when entered based on the data validation rules. The system must use client-side data validation to improve performance for ordinary execution, i.e., no attacks. Client-side validation is faster since no request is sent to server.

Descritivo_da_US: US01: Como Scrum Master quero editar as respostas do questionário para melhor representar um fator
Tarefa_original: #3- Salvar as novas respostas no servidor[DONE - Breno]
NFR_Sentença: If the server goes offline during data insertion, the system must display a loading for a maximum of 1 minute. If the backend comes back in the meantime, the data insertion operation must be performed automatically. Otherwise, if the server remains unresponsive after 1 minute, the system must notify the server problem for users.

This not only improves security, but also reduces the risk of corrupt data, makes it easier to find bugs and facilitates error handling.
